title: I dreamed that I was engaged to someone I don't know

preview.html: If she is sad in the dream, this means that she is currently approaching a bad person in her life and she will see sadness and depression from this relationship with him, and God knows best, so stay with us to find out more through the interpreter. com.Interpretation of a dream: I was engaged to someone I do not know in a dream about a girl. When an unmarried woman saw in her dream that she was engaged to someone she did not know, she was happy. An indication that in the next period of time, new news will reach her and her situation will change for the better. It also explains the end of many problems that She was going through it in her life, God willing. It was as if she was dissatisfied with this dream engagement, and she felt very sad in the dream. The meaning indicates that he is entering into a relationship with the bad and suffering from it. It also indicates that there are sorrows in her life that she cannot get rid of or eliminate quickly. If an unmarried woman sees in a dream that she is engaged to someone with aesthetics and beauty in the dream. It explains the meaning of the new life that this girl will live during this period. And that she will live happily and abundantly, God willing, and soon she will have a good husband. See also: Interpretation of the dream of canceling the engagement. Interpretation Testimony that I was engaged to someone I do not know in a dream about a married woman. Seeing that a married woman was engaged to her husband in a dream by a stranger. The dream interprets her success in life and that she is able to overcome many of her problems. It also indicates her intense desire and attachment to life and her inability To ignore her affairs. What if she saw her husband bringing her someone she did not know to propose to him in a dream. It shows her strong relationship with her husband, and that there is a strong and respectful relationship between them in their lives. And that she cannot do anything in her life without referring to him and taking his opinion on it, and God knows best. Likewise, a married woman accepted in a dream to marry someone she did not know in the dream. This indicates that she will soon experience some new and happy things in her life. And that she will overcome failure in all areas of her life and work, God willing. Interpretation of a dream that I was engaged to someone I do not know In a dream about a divorced woman. If a divorced woman dreams that she is happily engaged to someone she does not know in the dream. It announces that she will get close to someone in her life and live with him in a romantic life. And that she will marry him very soon and live with him in good happiness. And if he refuses, someone will dream about him. He does not know him, so he feels sad and upset. We explain here that during this period she will face major crises in her life after her divorce. She will try hard to overcome them, and God Almighty will help her in this matter. If he sees a man struggling a lot, to propose to her in the dream, and he does not recognize him in the dream. This It interprets the presence of someone who is actually trying to get close to her in her life and follow him. It indicates that she will get married soon, and she will live a new successful experience in her life. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about your engagement to someone you love. Interpretation of a dream that I was engaged to a woman I do not know in a dream about a man and its meaning. When he saw in the dream that the dreamer was Engaged to a woman he did not know and he was very happy with her. It shows that he is looking for stability in life, and that he is trying hard to reach his goal. He also explains the quiet life

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about passing an exam from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of success in an exam in a dream: Seeing an exam is considered one of the frightening visions that cause anxiety in a person, but what is the significance of seeing success in an exam? What is the significance of this? This vision has many connotations that vary according to many criteria, including that success may be at a certain educational stage or specific to a certain period of time, and it may be success at university or high school. What concerns us in this article is mentioning all the indicators and cases of the dream of passing exams. Get to know On the interpretation of a dream about passing an exam from Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about passing an exam. The vision of an examination expresses the psychological and stressful pressures that a person is exposed to and the tasks that pile up on him and he is asked to complete them quickly before they escalate and cause him a burden that is difficult to get rid of. This vision also indicates continuous dealing with worldly matters. And taking risks and adventures that involve some kind of risk, and experiencing many experiences that require a person to respond quickly and adapt. As for the interpretation of seeing success in exams in a dream, this vision indicates overcoming the obstacles and difficulties that stand between him and his goals, and passing the critical period of his life. , freeing himself from many of the restrictions that prevented him from moving smoothly. If someone says: I dreamed that I passed the exam, this is evidence of the disappearance of sadness, the disappearance of fear and tension, the loss of despair in the heart, a feeling of psychological comfort and reassurance, and the beginning of new experiences that will benefit him in the long run. This vision also indicates the end of a difficult problem that preoccupied the dreamer and occupied his thinking. And finding appropriate solutions to some of the complex issues that plagued his life, and the end of a difficult stage in which he lost a lot, and the loss is not that. Only the material, but the loss of effort, energy and emotion. The interpretation of the dream of passing the exam by Ibn Sirin is not worth anything. Ibn Sirin mentioned the interpretation of attending the exam, but he did not devote a specific chapter to academic exams, rather his intention was to take the exam in general, and we consider it as follows: Seeing the exam indicates... Suffering and pain, difficulties and hardships on the road, the many goals to be achieved, the complexity of the paths to be taken and engaging in many battles to achieve the desired victory. This vision also expresses the accumulation of problems, the succession of crises, increasing anxiety, the intensity of sorrows in the heart, and exposure to a serious illness that depletes Vitality and vitality, and forces its owner to lie down in bed. If one sees that he has passed the exams, this symbolizes the passage of a critical period, the death of the danger and evil that befell him, the end of sadness and distress, the restoration of a lost right, and the return of water to its state. A natural path. And whoever is poor, this vision expresses the spaciousness of life, the opening of the doors of livelihood, a noticeable change in the situation, the collapse of adversity, the overcoming of adversity, and a feeling of strength and activity. But if the viewer is unemployed, this indicates the availability of job opportunities that suit him, It achieves self-sufficiency and provides him with daily livelihood.

title: Interpretation of the vision of reading Surat Al-Fil in a dream in detail

preview.html: Also, the prevailing interpretation in most cases is that reading Surat Al-Fil in a dream indicates defeating enemies and getting rid of them. Interpretation of reciting Surat Al-Fil by Ibn Sirin Ibn Shirin says that when a person sees himself reading Surat Al-Fil in his dream, the sign of that is good, because it indicates his victory over his enemies and opponents. Whether in war, in the field of work, or in the field. About knowledge. Also, reciting Surat Al-Fil in the Qur’an is evidence of the inability of others to control his mistakes and falling into his traps, and Surat Al-Fil can indicate the comfort, happiness and prosperity that the dreamer will achieve in the coming period of his life, God Almighty willing. Interpretation of reading Surat Al-Fil for unmarried women when you see An unmarried girl dreams that she is reading Surah Al-Fil, this is evidence that she will defeat competitors in her life, whether it is her scientific and academic life or her professional life. Surah Al-Fil is also an indication that, God willing, she will not fall into the traps of people who prey on her mistakes and want her to fail and destroy her life. In the future, and God knows best. Interpretation of reading Surat Al-Fil for a married woman: If a married woman sees in her dream that she is reading Surat Al-Fil, this means good, because it indicates the disappearance of the problems, worries, and problems that she suffers from. It is also a sign of her victory over those who want her to make her married life fail. It also indicates the inability of others to create problems and disputes between her and her husband and their creation, God Almighty willing. Interpretation of reciting Surat Al-Fil for a pregnant womanReciting Surat Al-Fil in a pregnant woman’s dream is a sign of the cessation of problems and difficulties and freedom from problems and difficulties. Surat Al-Fil is also an indication that she will defeat her enemies, with permission. God is the one who does not want her safety and continuity in her life, and it is also an indication of the safety and health of her future child, if she wishes. God.Interpretation of reading Surat Al-Fil for a manWhen a man sees in a dream that he is reading Surat Al-Fil, this is a sign of abundant sustenance, profit in trade, victory over his competitors in his professional life, and defeat of people who expect evil and wickedness. His work and who is planning to fire him from his job, and God knows best.

title: Interpretation of a car accident in a dream

preview.html: We present to you the interpretation of a car accident in a dream according to the opinion of some commentators and translators, but they are interpretations that can be correct or wrong, and we can say that the order of salvation comes from a story in which Joseph, peace be upon him, said: “A car came and they sent and brought them back, so he left his bucket and said: O Busra.” The salvation of Joseph, peace be upon him, was by car, and God knows best. Interpretation of a car accident in a dream: Perhaps a dream about a car accident in a dream indicates anxiety, tension, and fear of the unknown that the person is exposed to in his life. A dream about a car accident, according to some interpreters, may indicate unhappy events that may occur For scenes, including work, trade, or sad news. A traffic accident may also indicate quarrels with relatives. If the accident was on an unpaved or dangerous road, the dreamer entering the wrong road may cause trouble. Interpretation of a dream about a car accident in waterIf the Dreaming of a car falling into water, this indicates the tension and turmoil that the dreamer may suffer from in his professional life. Some commentators also mentioned that it could indicate the presence of problems with a close person. Some commentators also explained that if the car accident had preceded the car lights being turned off, then This danger indicates the result of a wrong decision. Interpretation of a dream about a wrecked car: Whoever dreams that he is driving a car in a dream and then collides with another car indicates that he will face many problems, and some commentators have said that they may be caused by those close to him. This incident may also indicate his hesitation in The affairs of his life, which may cause a conflict of interest. If he dreams that he has crashed his car into something solid like a tree, for example, this indicates that he has fallen into an experiment. Some have narrated, and God knows best, that this is evidence of his being afflicted with the disease. Some commentators also said that if he dreams that he collided with his car, this is a warning of the danger he faces. Interpretation of a dream about a car accident and death: If he sees in a dream that he was involved in a car accident and then died or someone died with him, then this indicates neglect in his life, and perhaps mismanagement in his life. It could be It can also indicate anxiety about a specific topic or fear of life’s difficulties that he may be exposed to. It can also indicate the material loss that the viewer may suffer. Interpretation of a dream about a car accident for individuals: In a dream, an unmarried woman may indicate that she has made many decisions If she is engaged, some have suggested that this may indicate differences related to her fiancé, which she should deal with tactfully and intelligently. If she saw that she was involved in a car accident, but she survived, thank God, this indicates her good condition and her survival, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about a car accident for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she was involved in a traffic accident, this indicates the exhaustion of her pregnancy and the difficulty of giving birth, and if she is patient, it will be This is a good reward for her. It can also indicate an apparition

title: Interpretation of dreams My ex-husband buys me clothes in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of my ex-husband’s dream of buying me clothes in a dream. In the following lines, we will learn the interpretation of my ex-husband’s dream of buying me clothes in a dream and whether it is good or not. Interpretation of dreams: My ex-husband buys me clothes in a dream. Interpretation of my ex-husband’s dream of buying me clothes in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this, except that buying new clothes for the divorced woman is compensation from God, and God knows the unseen. If the divorced woman sees herself buying new clothes, this may represent a good change, and God knows best. If the divorced woman is seen buying new clothes, this may indicate the maintenance of the righteous husband, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about my ex-husband buying me shoes in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about my ex-husband buying me shoes in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this. However, seeing a divorced woman buying shoes in a dream could be a sign of good changes, and God knows the unseen. Seeing a divorced woman buying shoes could also represent goodness, God willing, as the vision of buying shoes may indicate food, and God knows the unseen. If A divorced woman saw herself buying white shoes in a dream. This may be evidence that she is getting rid of judgments, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about taking my clothes from my ex-wife’s house in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about taking my clothes from my ex-husband’s house in a dream: Taking things from your ex-husband’s house may It indicates that you are thinking about returning, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. In the event that you see a divorced woman taking things from my ex-wife’s house, it may express the sadness she is experiencing, and God knows the unseen. It can also indicate religion and their need for help, and God knows best. If the divorced woman dreams of taking furniture from her ex-husband’s house. This may be a sign of marriage, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about driving a bus for a divorced woman in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about driving a bus for a divorced woman in a dream could be a sign of sadness that is overwhelming her, but she will overcome it, God willing. If a divorced woman sees herself in a dream riding a bus, this may be a sign of marriage, and God knows best. A sign of good changes, and God knows best, as it can express a new beginning full of happiness, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of the dream of driving the bus with my ex-husband in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of driving the bus with my ex-husband in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this, except that seeing a divorced woman driving a bus in a dream may be a sign of sadness, but she will get rid of it, God willing. If a divorced woman sees in a dream a divorced woman driving a bus, this may be a sign of new beginnings, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. When she sees a divorced woman driving a bus Crowded, this may indicate good changes, and God knows the unseen. When you see a married woman driving the bus with her husband, it may be a sign of love, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. title: Interpretation of forgiveness in a dream by Ibn Sirin and leading scholars

preview.html: Apologizing in a dream is considered one of the beautiful dreams that one can see in his sleep, as apologizing to someone who wronged me is a virtue, forgiveness, and a beautiful soul that this person has. In a dream for a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, as well as for a man, we will tell you through this article the most important interpretations related to seeing an apology in a dream. Apology in a dream Seeing an apology in a dream indicates the need to think about and reckon with the one who saw this vision, his actions and behavior with others, as well as reconciliation with differences. And ending the hostility between them. While seeing an apology in a dream may indicate the end of a bitter phase in which the dreamer suffered from the accumulation of many disputes and problems on his shoulders. An apology in a dream can also symbolize that it is a natural reflection of the dreamer’s good character, which is characterized by a pure soul and a pure heart. Because when he commits a mistake, he apologizes for it and stays away from it. But if a person sees an apology in a dream or asks for forgiveness, this undoubtedly indicates good and beloved meanings and things. For example, if he is suffering from sadness, God will make him happy, but if he is going through a crisis, God will relieve his anxiety, and if he is facing a health problem, this is evidence that he will recover soon, God willing. Asking forgiveness from Ibn Sirin in a dream. The scholar Ibn Sirin believes that apologizing in a dream can be an indication of the extent to which the dreamer feels remorse for committing many transgressions and wrong behaviors in his real life. This vision can also symbolize positive signs, which is the dreamer’s desire to apologize and reconcile in reality with someone close to his heart, but they had a disagreement, and it was the dreamer who made a mistake. title: What is the interpretation of a bird in a dream, and talking and slaughtering a bird in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq?

preview.html: The bird in a dream A person loves to watch birds and deal with them in reality, whether they are ornamental birds or those who raise and exploit them, and there are many interpretations about seeing a bird in a dream that we care to present in this article. The bird in a dream by Ibn Sirin The bird in a dream The interpretation of a dream about a bird indicates comfort and psychological peace along with a person’s love, and the pursuit of gaining gains and benefits from his high morale, patience and ambition. Most commentators prove that whoever sees it in his dream achieves an important position at work and is highly appreciated by those around him. Most jurists explain that the bird sitting on the dreamer’s head is a sign of money and great benefits that a person will soon obtain, and God knows best. A person’s circumstances change and his conditions improve, whether related to his emotional or practical life, by seeing it in a dream, so he becomes happy and joyful in his life. Eating meat is a sign of losing unhappiness as well as illness, especially if the dreamer is sick and very tired. As for the quiet sound of birds, it is good news for happy news, but if it is not and is loud and bad, it is likely to express the news The unpleasant thing that will reach the dreamer. The bird in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin indicates that the meaning of the bird in a dream is the expansion of a person's livelihood, the sweetness of his life in peace and love, in addition to the ease of reaching his dreams and not facing new obstacles. It can be confirmed that the person's practical status will rise or he can enter into a new trade that suits his needs, in addition to bringing many benefits to his life with his growth and progress. Ibn Sirin explains that this dream differs in its interpretation according to the condition of the bird that the dreamer sees and the individual's special circumstances. As for eating its meat in general, it is one of the useful things in the world of interpretation, as it suggests making lawful money and God blesses the dreamer in it, and he may find an important and new job or double the salary from his work. Ibn Sirin explains that the owner of the dream who offers food to the bird in his dream is in reality a righteous and righteous person who helps the needy and is never stingy with people. As for the bird sitting in the dreamer's hand, it is considered one of the good news and happy things that confirm the good news that will come to him in the near future. A specialized Egyptian site that includes a group of the best interpreters of dreams and visions in the Arab world. To access it, type the Egyptian dream interpretation site in Google. Interpretation of a bird in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq Imam Al-Sadiq says that the interpretation of a dream about a bird has many wonderful and commendable meanings that express the presence of goodness and justice in the dreamer’s personality and his enjoyment of his lawful money. As for its feathers, it is an indication of the abundance of profits that the dreamer obtains and the large amount of money that comes to him, and he will not know the meaning of fatigue to bear it. He explains that birds in a dream are a symbol of the dreamer’s psychological comfort, his calm and reassurance during this period and his reluctance to spoil his life with discussions and disputes. He confirms that large birds are more beneficial in a dream for the visionary, as they show many goals and ambitions that he

title: The correct indicators for interpreting a dream about a young child in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a young child in a dream Seeing a young child in a dream can raise many questions for the dreamer himself, especially if he sees him sick or crying intensely, and there are some important details that can differ from one person’s vision to another and bring different symbols and interpretations. So we have collected the sayings of famous and reliable scholars of interpretation, and for this we have put them in your hands in today's topic. What is the interpretation of a dream about a small child? A small child in a dream expresses the good feelings that the dreamer feels, after suffering a lot of pain and suffering and standing firmly in front of him, but there are still some other interpretations that the vision carries. If the small child in the fortune teller's dream looks beautiful and beautiful by nature, then this is a promising vision for its owner. The vision expresses that the hardworking person in his life must come today and reap the result of his work and diligence, so there is no need to worry about it or rush the results. Seeing a child still crawling is evidence of the beginning of the implementation of a certain project or the previous intention to establish a cooperative relationship with someone, whether it is a business partnership or marriage. As for seeing him trying to stand up and fall again, repeating attempts, etc., this dream is a sign of patience, determination and challenging difficulties that make the dreamer never despair in his efforts to reach the desired goal. It was also said that playing and playing with a small child is evidence of a major promotion or a prestigious job. Seeing him in a woman's dream can express About psychological comfort after a long period of suffering, whether with the husband or with the children, and that she will soon reap the result of what she has provided for them. The little boy in a dream for Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin said: Seeing a boy if it is a female is good of any kind, whether it indicates the approaching satisfaction of the bachelor's desire and his entry into a new life with the good girl who will be his wife. Or for a married man who wants to have a child, and he has been deprived for a long time, he may give birth to this child soon. He also said that it expresses relief after distress, if the owner of the dream suffers from the accumulation of debts that he had to borrow, he can pay everything he owes later and God (Glory be to Him) will give him from where he does not expect. It may represent leaving the old house if it is too small for the family and moving to a new house that is more spacious than the previous house. What is the interpretation of a dream of a little boy for a single woman? A little boy dreams of being single The little boy in a dream for an unmarried woman has many good meanings, as long as he is beautiful in shape, but if the opposite is true, then seeing him does not bode well. A girl seeing a little boy smiling at her and exchanging a smile It is evidence of the fulfillment of a long-standing desire, and this desire may be related to her professional life if she has aspirations related to knowledge and achievement, or related to joining an important job through which she can fulfill herself. As for if the girl’s aspirations focus on marrying someone she loves and wants to be associated with, then her vision indicates the proximity of her marriage to that person. Some commentators also mentioned that a girl who is carrying a child
